data.name: Text_Client_Help_Command_Match_UI_Discard_Card
data.value: Discards a card from your hand into a shared discard pile (goes through UI thread ).

data.name: Text_Client_Help_Command_Match_UI_Draw_From_Deck
data.value: Draws a new card from the deck into your hand (goes through UI thread ).

data.name: Text_Client_Help_Command_Match_UI_Draw_From_Discard
data.value: Draws a card from the top of a discard pile into your hand (goes through UI thread ).

data.name: Text_Client_Help_Command_Match_End_Turn
data.value: Ends your turn and submits the requested game actions to the server for approval.

data.name: Text_Client_Help_Command_Match_Turn_Pass_Cards
data.value: Passes two cards from your hand to your partner's hand.

data.name: Text_Client_Help_Command_Match_UI_Play_Card
data.value: Plays a card from your hand into your collection (goes through UI thread ).

data.name: Text_Client_Help_Command_Match_Reset_Turn
data.value: Resets the set of game actions composing your turn.
